instruction: Develop a role-playing game set in a post-apocalyptic world.
output: The game takes place in a post-apocalyptic world decades after a mysterious event caused society to collapse and devolve into small, isolated communities. Players take on the role of survivors and explore a massive, open world in search of resources and other survivors to form alliances with. They must craft weapons, build shelters, and hunt wildlife to survive while also avoiding bandits, mutants, and other dangers.
